title: Milo Yiannopoulos
summary: Milo Yiannopoulos (/jəˈnɒpələs/;[10] born Milo Hanrahan, 18 October 1984),[1] who has also published as Milo Andreas Wagner[11] and the mononym Milo,[12] is a British far-right, alt right, and alt-lite political commentator, polemicist, public speaker, and writer. His speeches and writings often ridicule Islam, feminism, social justice, and political correctness.[13][14][15] Yiannopoulos is a former editor for Breitbart News, a far-right media organisation.[16]
